Text:
Hi Zen-Bud
Thanks for your great work - i love the Full HD quality and can play thru xbox without problem - However hate the 2.1 channels output.

I there any way u can make ur rips audio better?
so this is just a RE-encode of a encoded blu-ray from publichd?
good job Zen_Bud - thank you for your effort !

Thanks Zen_bud for your rips so far.

Unfortunately i wont be downloading much from ur's moving forward as the audio is 2.1 only and u can't do much to include it - But thanks for ur support so far, enjoyed your rips and still an fan for the quality of videos
